thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Gail Askew Sweeting
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Gail Askew Sweeting

author: Gail Askew Sweeting
title: Gail Askew Sweeting
text:
I was booking a trip to Cuba for my kids and your website was EXCELLENT!!!! Easy to use, incredibly informative, great competitive prices with no surprises at the end that cost us more than we expected!!!
I will DEFINITELY use your company again!
Thank you for everything!
Gail S.
